full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service Form Approved OMB No. 43-R0595 DEMOGRAPHIC DATA TO ACCOMPANY APPLICATION FOR CREATION OF A RECORD OF LAWFUL ADMISSION FOR AN INDOCHINA REFUGEE (PLEASE TYPE OR PRINT) 1. (Family Name, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. Alien Registration Number HONG SY (NONE) 1-23-758-501 1a. Name which you were admitted to the United States (if different from above) Telephone Number.
